original_solution_mapping.L1: In the second third of the trip, Lydia is going to use 60 liters of fuel / 3 = <<60/3=20>>20 liters of fuel.
original_solution_mapping.L2: In the final third of the trip, she needs half of this amount so she is going to be using 20 liters / 2 = <<20/2=10>>10 liters of fuel.
original_solution_mapping.L3: So in the first third, Lydia used the remaining amount of fuel which is 60 total liters of fuel - 20 liters of fuel in the second third - 10 liters of fuel in the final third = <<60-20-10=30>>30 liters of fuel.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6170.
    Returns: the amount of fuel Lydia can use in the first third of the trip.
    """
    # L1
    total_fuel = 60 # 60 liters of fuel
    second_third_divisor = 3 # a third of all of her fuel
    fuel_second_third = total_fuel / second_third_divisor

    # L2
    half_divisor = 2 # half this amount
    fuel_final_third = fuel_second_third / half_divisor

    # L3
    fuel_first_third = total_fuel - fuel_second_third - fuel_final_third

    # FA
    answer = fuel_first_third
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: In the second third of the trip, Lydia is going to use {total_fuel} liters of fuel / {second_third_divisor} = <<{total_fuel}/{second_third_divisor}={fuel_second_third}>>{fuel_second_third} liters of fuel.

In the final third of the trip, she needs half of this amount so she is going to be using {fuel_second_third} liters / {half_divisor} = <<{fuel_second_third}/{half_divisor}={fuel_final_third}>>{fuel_final_third} liters of fuel.

So in the first third, Lydia used the remaining amount of fuel which is {total_fuel} total liters of fuel - {fuel_second_third} liters of fuel in the second third - {fuel_final_third} liters of fuel in the final third = <<{total_fuel}-{fuel_second_third}-{fuel_final_third}={fuel_first_third}>>{fuel_first_third} liters of fuel.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: In the second third of the trip, Lydia is going to use 60 liters of fuel / 3 = <<60/3=20>>20 liters of fuel.

explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'fuel_second_third' (value: 20.0) was reported instead of 'fuel_first_third' (value: 30.0).
